definition: seeking only ease and comfort (idiom); making no attempt to improve oneself/taking things easily without attending to responsibilities
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Everyone in the company is supposed to work hard, not to lie on a bed of roses.
sentences.chinese: 公司裏的每個人都應努力工作，不得苟且偷安。

sentences.english: I prefer the challenge of life to the guaranteed existence;
sentences.chinese: 我寧願接受生活的挑戰而不願苟且偷安。

definition: see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
content to hold a small part of the territory/fig. forced to relinquish the middle ground/forced to move away
to bear humiliation to save one's skin (idiom)
(of a nation) to be destroyed/subjugation/vanquished nation
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
the country ruined and the people starving (idiom)
at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state/imminent crisis/living from hand to mouth
